description: She attends Meiritsu University with Kaoru, and was the one who convinced him to join the photography club, of which she`s also a member. She moves into the servant house that Kaoru is staying in because she had no place to stay after returning to Japan from a year-long trip around the world. She has a habit of greeting females by groping and fondling their breasts from behind, which most people find very uncouth (and frustrates Kaoru to no end). She`s loud and outspoken and very protective of Kaoru when it comes to Mayu. She`s also very fond of drinking and has an enormous capacity for alcohol...but still pays the inevitable price in hangovers.
name: Tina Foster
